page.title: 17GUITING POWER.LIGHT INDUSTRY
page.content: In our village is an agricultural contractor. He injects ammonia into straw to make it fit for animals to eat.He transports the ammonia to the farm and works there. He uses a Unimog to pull the trailer which carries the ammonia tank. The Unimog is like a tractor and runs on tractor tyres. It runs on diesel and uses 50 gallons of fuel weekly. Its motor is 100 h.p. and could pull 100tons but the legal weight is 24 tons. The contractor has an agent who advertises for him,and fixes his jobs. He likes working in a village,as there are many farms around, and the farmers know him. He thinks that light industries are important in a village, and help to keep it alive.
